pr_title: Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

timeline.message:
Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

Utilize newer Java language features to simplfy code by using Object.equals() rather than equals().

timeline.body:
This could be reduced further using AND, something like:
`return Objects.equals(tables, diskUsage.tables) && Objects.equals(usage, diskUsage.usage);`

Also, any thought to replacing hashCode at the same time to use Objects.hash(tables, usage); - that might help with the constraint that equals and hashCode are consistent.
timeline.bodyHTML:
This could be reduced further using AND, something like:
return Objects.equals(tables, diskUsage.tables) && Objects.equals(usage, diskUsage.usage);

Also, any thought to replacing hashCode at the same time to use Objects.hash(tables, usage); - that might help with the constraint that equals and hashCode are consistent.
timeline.author: EdColeman

replies.bodyText: Thanks @EdColeman . Updated to add further simplification and updated hashCode.
replies.author: jmark99

replies.bodyText: I think the same thing could apply to the other 2 classes.
replies.author: EdColeman

replies.bodyText: @EdColeman pushed up changes to the other two classes.
replies.author: jmark99

timeline.message:
Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

Simplified equals() method a bit further and replaced existing hashCode
method with Objects.hash()

Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

Updated the equals() and hashcode() methods in InputTableConfig and
Condition classes.

timeline.body: This was changed from `instanceof` to the use of `getClass()`, which is not the same. The latter is more narrow. I think it should be changed back to `instanceof`, although the check for null would be redundant, since `instanceof` is always false if it's null.
timeline.bodyText: This was changed from instanceof to the use of getClass(), which is not the same. The latter is more narrow. I think it should be changed back to instanceof, although the check for null would be redundant, since instanceof is always false if it's null.
timeline.bodyHTML: This was changed from instanceof to the use of getClass(), which is not the same. The latter is more narrow. I think it should be changed back to instanceof, although the check for null would be redundant, since instanceof is always false if it's null.
timeline.author: ctubbsii

replies.bodyText: @ctubbsii, I reverted the aforementioned check back to its original form. Thanks.
replies.author: jmark99

timeline.message:

timeline.body:
This could be simplified to:

```suggestion
    if (!(o instanceof Condition))
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
This could be simplified to:

Suggested change
if (o == null || !(o instanceof Condition))
if (!(o instanceof Condition))
